body.name: Area Rug Living Room Rugs - 6x9 Large Soft Indoor Neutral Modern Abstract Low Pile Washable Rug Carpet for Bedroom Dining Room Farmhouse Home Office - Grey
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 5 hrs 14 mins

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: SUPER SOFT AND COMFORTABLE: This low pile area rug is very soft to the touch and high quality. You step on it and it feels like walking on a cloud, super soft against your feet. You could sleep on it and it's comfortable to sit on, too. Dogs love lying on this rug, baby loves crawling on it

NON SLIP BACKING: The backing is fiber cloth with TPE decent for this style of rug. It also grips the floor nicely and doesn't slide around. TPE is 100% recyclable, versatile and is made to be remade. This rug has recycled material and it can be recycled again

WASHABLE AND EASY TO CARE: For daily care, you may use a vacuum to removal debris on the surface. For deep cleaning, just warm water and soap them up and hose them down with no issues. You can also transfer the entire rug into the washing machine with cold water, and dry without heat on an air-only dryer cycle

NEUTRAL ABSTRACT AREA RUG: Cool design and colors are nice and abstract, perfect to where you want something soft to sit or lay down on or adds brightness to the room, like casual family room, living room, bedroom, nursery room, dining room, ect. Because of the coloring it will hide stains or dirt very well

SKIN FRIENDLY DURABLE: The rug is very well made, and the short pile is made of high quality fibers. It's a heavy duty rug. No Pilling No Shedding, Pet friendly, Anti-fatigue, Stain resistant and Fade resistant. We offer 2 years warranty, if any question, please feel free to contact us

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Grey Blue Area Rugs Beige Blue Area Rugs Grey Living Room Rugs NEW Grey Area Rugs Washable ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓ Size 8'x10' 8'x10' 8'x10' 8'x10' Non-Slip Backing ✓ ✓ ✓ ✓

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I bought the 9x12 for my living room and I absolutely love it! The pattern is beautiful- does not look stretched and is super soft. My youngest has been rolling all over it saying “ooooh soooooft” LOL! Material is not too thick so perfect if you have kiddos who drop crumbs/food as they cruise around because it’s easy to run a vacuum over. I had a shag carpet and it was the worst to clean… now I’m not worried if I have to clean some bananas out. Perfect for a big rug/carpet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 28, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This rug is so incredibly soft to the touch. Because it can be washed in a washing machine, it's thin, so we ordered a thick, plush rug pad for extra comfort. It's in my laundry room which gets a ton of traffic, and everyone comments on how soft it feels to walk on. The color comes across as light cream and blue. Very pretty and worth the money. We've only had it a few weeks, but so far so good.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The area rug is super soft and looks really nice, it does have more of a white look to the lightest grays than in the photos. Still super nice and I love that it has a rubber bottom. Amazon for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Light weight, soft, and easy to lay down
reviews.reviewText: This was the perfect purchase for an area carpet. This come in a small(ish) box, easy for one person to lift and carry. The material is soft, and super easy to wipe things up. Full rubber backing for non-slip. THE EDGES DON'T ROLL. It comes folded in the small box, rather than rolled and wrapped, preventing the edges to roll. There are crease lines in the carpet from being folded, however they are laying flatter and flatter as the day goes one. Will be interested to see how this holds up after our first trip to the laundromat for machine washing. We got this specifically for that reason as we have 4 pets in the house and kids to come soon.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Really nice and so soft
reviews.reviewText: Got the 8x10 for our living room and love it. It's thin but actually very soft, stylish and neutral. We just unpackaged it and it lays very nicely right away. Very happy with this purchase and would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 22, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Soft to the touch
reviews.reviewText: Really like this rug. It is thinner than most, but doesn’t need a rug pad and the wrinkles released out quickly. I would order again in different patterns!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not exactly what I expected
reviews.reviewText: It was a nice rug, although quite thin. I’m sure this is what makes it washable. It feels like a soft velvet rather than carpet fiber which I was ok with. I returned it because the color and pattern seemed to be printed on the top of the rug and did not extend through the fiber. This and the pixelated look of the rug wasn’t exactly what I wanted for my room. It looks okay from a distance. With the limited ink used to print the pattern on the rug, I doubted its ability to withstand multiple washings if needed. With pets, I wanted something a little sturdier and better constructed. There isn’t much to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I’m so happy with this rug. It’s so soft and the colors are perfect.

reviews.reviewTitle: Achetez seulement si vous y mettez quelque chose de lourd pour le tenir : table de cuisine ou autre
reviews.reviewText: 9 X 12 pour ma table à manger, c'est parfait, très beau mais plus petit de taille qu'annoncé. Il arrive dans une petite boite qu'on ose à peine à croire qu'il y a un tapis 9 X 12 de plié à l'intérieur. En effet, déplié et placé, il garde toujours des bosses ou ondulation qui ne partent pas car ce tapis est trop mince. C'est comme un tissus trop mince pour en faire un tapis. Mais, il est beau et doux tel que décrit. Trop grand pour ma machine à laver, je doute que les machines commerciales les acceptes. Bref, je suis déçue de mon achat car on s'enrage dedans à cause des bosses. C'est un tapis dangereux finalement. Meme une table de cuisine qui le teint en général, garde des ondulations de bosses qui ne partent pas même si on les poussent vers l'extérieur. Le tapis est comme déformé comme tissus et sans parler des plis d'emballage que je doute ne partirons jamais. Mais, il est beau.
